title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 501.1 - Service of papers by the commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 501.1 - Service of papers by the commissioner

State Regulations

Notices or other papers will be served by the commissioner
either personally, electronically or by mail. Service on a representative of a
party will be deemed to be proper service upon the party. Service by mail will
be deemed completed five days after the date of mailing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17

501.1

Amended

New

York State Register February 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 05, eff. 2/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
